roleset.name: exist in some manner or for some length of time
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8.

example.name: MNR and arg1
example.text: I would like to move into the next stage of my life as an older woman, hopefully putting the wisdom of a hard-lived life to good use, both at home and at work.

example.name: arg1, TMP
example.text: The episode was very short - lived , and the patient was conversant throughout .
